response.original_title: Hopelessly in Love: Lisa "Left Eye" Lopes and Andre Rison
response.overview: An inside look at the intense and complex relationship between TLC pop star Lisa “Left Eye” Lopes and NFL wide receiver Andre Rison. We will delve deeper into their passionate yet impetuous romance that went from abuse allegations to a mansion up in flames. Never-before-seen footage reveals the depth of their love, and the underlying turmoil that tore them apart just months before Lisa’s inexplicable, premature death.
response.title: Hopelessly in Love: Lisa "Left Eye" Lopes and Andre Rison

results.name: Hopelessly In Love Trailer: Left Eye & Andre Rison
